title: ゲーム要素アンケート
description: 以下の質問にお答えください。

question_groups.title: ユーザー情報
question_groups.description: あなたについて教えて下さい。

questions.label: お名前
あなたのメールアドレス
年齢
性別

question_groups.title: ゲームをプレイする理由
question_groups.description:
あなたがゲームをプレイする理由について教えてください。ただし、選択肢は次の文章に続くものとします。
I play video games ...

questions.label: because I like the feeling of continuous advancement
because I like to advance in games
because I like it when I get to the next level/stage/point in games
because I like competing with others
because I like to win
because I like to be better than others
because I can get to know new people
because I like playing with others
because I feel close to other gamers
because I find the relationships I form in games meaningful
because I can do things that I am unable to do or I am not allowed to do in real life
because I can be in another world
to be somebody else or somewhere else for a while
because I feel immersed in the virtual world
because I like to experiment with different ways to play the games
because I like to figure out how specific game elements work in detail
because I like to discover/learn the game mechanics thoroughly
until I get 100% on them, completing everything possible
until I unlock all achievements
until I master all elements of a game
because I can determine for myself what I do in games
because I can play the games according to my preferences
because they provide me with interesting options and choices
because I experience a lot of freedom in games
because gaming sharpens my senses
because it improves my skills
because it improves my concentration
because it improves my coordination skills
because I like to uncover hidden areas, secrets, or lore
because they provide me with opportunities to explore hidden or unknown elements
because I like to explore new places and ideas
because I like the feeling of powerful or dominant in the games
because I like to be stronger than my opponents
because I like to overcome difficult challenges
because I like to push myself to beat hard levels
because I like the sense of accomplishment after success

question_groups.title: ゲームの好み
question_groups.description:
あなたのゲームの好みについて教えてください。ただし、選択肢は次の文章に続くものとします。
I like video games that ...

questions.label: allow players to cooperate with others
promote working together in a group
require players to work together
involve an interesting story
involve an elaborate story that stimulates my emotions
involve an immersive narrative
allow players to customize their in-game objects (e.g., avatar/vehicle/stuff…)
provide players with a lot of customization options
allow players to personalize their objects/stuff/characters so that those can be unique
require strategic thinking
require planning ahead and making strategic decisions
require tactical decision making
are visually breathtaking
have outstanding graphics
have good graphics, are beautiful
allow players to make explosions
involve destruction
allow players to mess things up
allow players to build things freely
involve creating unique solutions or constructing original structures
promote creative approaches to challenges
